name: Jolibut Simulator
description:
The simulation takes place in a city skyscraper on fire. You will play the paper of 2 guys trying to save as many people as you can before the fire destroys everything. The cameras are on, the show is going, society is observing you what do you do! Earn their respect and admiration :)

Save the falling people! Avoid the burning ones - will spoil the mattress - no matter who is.

The more time you take, the harder the game will become, and even.. unfinishable...

Will you be able to save enough people to gain society's respect?

Follow the instructions: https://www.tekrevue.com/tip/windows-protected-your-pc-disable-smartscreen/
